about_the_game:
Legacy of Valor is a realistic story-based RPG in which you will not find traps in the form of dragons, wizards or spells, but you will experience the joys and sorrows of the real Middle Ages first hand. Only you decide the fate of your hero. Will you become the beloved lord of your people or the feared outlaw? That depends only on you.

Game is offering to the players a new look into the medieval era as a noble, where they'll encounter the hideous greed for power of a greedy nobility capable of scheming for their own good, having affairs with anyone and marry off their offspring into "marriages of convenience", but at the same time experience the authenticity of the cruel misery of the Middle Ages, diseases, filth, brothels, poverty and much more.

The story of the game begins idyllically. You are a young nobleman who lives in the court of King Theodore II. in the capital of the kingdom. As a member of the Crown Prince's retinue, you enjoy life, festivities, tournaments, drinking and women. Lately you have taken a liking to the young wife of the local burgrave. And that is the beginning of your downfall. Burgrave gets the news about his wife's affair and challenges you to a duel. But the burgrave is known as an excellent swordsman, and you cowardly run away instead of an honorable duel.

You are fleeing the capital with no money, no property, no position, and above all no honor. For the first time in your life, you will have to take care of yourself and earn money for food and lodging. You wander around the countryside for a while until you finally decide to return to your old estate. However, the seat of your family, once a strong castle, burned down many years ago and you have no choice but to embark on a difficult restoration.

Further, the story will unfold according to your decisions. You can become a good and beloved lord of your subjects or a feared bandit. And what will you do with the burgrave? Will you face him in a duel, reclaim your honor, or attempt an insidious revenge? You must also not forget that all your decisions will have consequences. Both short-term and long-term. 

An integral part will also be the production of your own objects, weapons, food and others.

You solve the surplus of production by trading with other cities and thus one of the ways to gain reputation and discover new places.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains blood effects during fights, opponents are killed in fights, dirty words or sexual references may appear in dialogues. Some characters may be naked, for example in a tavern. Alcohol can be consumed in the game.
